room_title: Escape room "Merlin's Lab" by Survival Escape Rooms in Valparaiso
room_description: A curse is settling upon the legendary city of Camelot. The great wizard Merlin is nowhere to be found. King Arthur has summoned you, his Knights, to the round table. Arthur fears the city will be engulfed by the curse in only one hours' time. He tells you it's up to you, the Knights of Camelot, to enter Merlin's Lab and find his spell book to lift the curse.
